metadataAttributes.Title: Cloud Computing Law: Law Enforcement, Competition, & Tax
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Have you ever wondered how a police officer in Europe can obtain evidence from a cloud provider in the USA? Or whether a major cloud provider might abuse its market power? Or in which countries cloud providers pay taxes? If so, then this course is for you!
metadataAttributes.Skills: Competition Law,Cloud Services,Law Enforcement Access,Tax,Cloud Computing,
